All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddPartFormController
Controller for add-part-form-view
AddProductFormController
The controller for the AddProductForm View
InHouse
Class for parts made in-house
Child of the Part class
Inventory
Class for the entire Inventory of Products and Parts
Keeps running lists for allParts and allProducts
also has useful common methods for Parts/Products within the Inventory
InventoryApplication
Main Class
On start loads Main form view
MainFormController
Controller for main-form-view FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: Add functionality to open a new view with info on a selected part or product
ModifyPartFormController
Controller for modify-part-form-view
ModifyProductFormController
Controller for modify-product-form-view
Outsourced
Class for parts outsourced to other companies
Child of the Part class
Part
Abstract class for Parts
Parent class for InHouse and Outsourced
Product
Class for Products
Products can be made up of many, one, or no Parts
Utils
The Utils class is a library of functions that are commonly used across the Inventory App
